message: Let's be fair and close the deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but this split is more reflective of the decreasing value over time.  Let's settle this now.
Considering the inflation, I'm making a compromise. Let's end this now.
This is becoming tedious. My offer is now slightly better than what you proposed last round. Take it or leave it - time is literally money!
I'll take a firmer stance. Inflation is hurting me more, so I need a better deal.
Alice, let's be realistic. This is my final offer. You're losing money much faster than me.  Agree now, or we both walk away with nothing.
